Segment.name: G12
Segment.comment: To describe physical characteristics and placement of coupons

Field.name: Length
Field.comment: Largest horizontal dimension of an object measured when the object is in the upright position

Field.name: Width
Field.comment: Shorter measurement of the two horizontal dimensions measured with the object in the upright position

Field.name: UnitOrBasisForMeasurementCode
Field.comment: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

Field.name: PromotionConditionCode
Field.comment: Code describing a performance or advertising condition

Field.name: PositionCode1
Field.comment: Code specifying the position of an item such as the location, within a specimen, from which the sample was taken; the position of a coupon within an advertisement; etc

Field.name: PositionCode2
Field.comment: Code specifying the position of an item such as the location, within a specimen, from which the sample was taken; the position of a coupon within an advertisement; etc

SyntaxNote.name: P010203
SyntaxNote.comment: If either G1201, G1202 or G1203 are present, then the others are required.

SyntaxNote.name: C0706
SyntaxNote.comment: If G1207 is present, then G1206 is required.
